articles.author: Ali Harb
articles.title: ‘A nightmare’: Lebanese Americans anxious, angry as Israel attacks homeland - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Lebanese community members in US are pushing through grief, fear and outrage to help people back home.
articles.content: Ali Dabaja says Lebanese Americans have been struggling for the past 12 months with work-life-genocide balance as tens of thousands of Palestinians have been killed in Israels war on the Gaza Strip.… [+10157 chars]
